content:
Here are some shorter one-liner options:

* "Remembering the language martyrs and honoring our mother tongue. Happy International Mother Language Day from One Dream."
* "Preserving our heritage, one language at a time. Thank you to the martyrs of the Bengali Language Movement. #OneDream"
* "Today we celebrate language and the sacrifices made to protect it. Happy International Mother Language Day from One Dream."
* "Language is more than just words, it's our identity. Thank you to the brave souls who fought for our mother tongue. #OneDream"
* "Proud to honor our roots and language on this International Mother Language Day. #OneDream"
